summary: I like to run until the finish line. As a professional in accounting since more than 25 years, I'd like to share my expertise in accounting, tax, VAT, planning, reporting, US Gaap, Sarbanes Oxley, statutory Gaap, and audit. My qualities of learner, achiever, analyst, relator, and accountability as well as my dedication can help existent or new organization to set up proper processes and ensure compliancy as well as provide solid information in order to make business decisions.

school.name: Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers

education.degree_name: Bachelor in Accounting (level 6 of Nederlandse waardering en EQF niveau)

profile_positions.description: RHQ Finance Manager: responsible for local finance activities of Headquarter in Amsterdam, including moth end close coordination with Shared Services Center & commercial divisions, budgeting, forecasting, compliance…
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
- From 04/02/2017 to 31/03/2017 transition of accounting activities from a swiss manufacturing site to the Shared Service Center located in Amterdam. I was travelling each weeks to write Standard Operational Processes used after the transition period as of mid June 2017.
- From 04/04/2017 to 15/06/2017 transition of accounting activities from a French manufacturing site of Stryker to the Shared Service Center of Amsterdam. I did travel each weeks to work with the local finance on transfer of General Accounting to Amsterdam. 
- From 16/06/2017 to 31/03/2019 Senior Financial Accountant of French manufacturing site of Cestas and support of Financial Accountant responsible for the Swiss manufacturing site. During this period I was responsible for daily accounting, month end close in 2 to 3 day, supervision and coaching of Junior Financial Accountant, reporting in HFM, producing reporting packages on Quarterly base, tax packages (monthly & quarterly), preparation and approval of Blackline reconciliations, ensuring Sox compliance (set of control framework, IPE's, reconciliation between accounting system and HFM as well as reconciliation between accounting system and Blackline...), preparation of audit, support for establishment of French Financial Statements.
- 01/04/2019 to today: work in a project team for improving the quality of Blackline reconciliations. Work with local Finance teams and Shared Service Centre teams through individual workshop cessions or conference calls. The project consists in reviewing accounts reconciliations and documentations provided by preparers in the SSC to see if they comply with Corporate Financial Policies, US GAAP, or local GAAP rules and apply if necessary corrective entries. In addition, we did implement templates, cheat sheets to guide preparers, approvers or reviewers of blackline reconciliations through the monthly process of reconciliation.
profile_positions.title: Financial Lead Accountant

profile_positions.description:
I have been accountable for all administration and accounting of the French and Belgium fillials of AMS.
My role included General Ledger accounting, Payroll activities, Month end close in 3 to 4 days, VAT, Intrastate declarations, all other tax (Medical device tax, CIT, Training tax, Apprenticeship Tax, Building tax, …) planning, forecasting, month end reconciliation and reporting, inter-company billings and receipts, payments, Statutory work, compliancy to Sarbanes Oxley rules and processes as well as local regulation, relation with Auditors, coaching of AP team and support of Financial Accountant Team... 
I was reporting to the International Finance Director, but was also the business partner of the Country Manager responsible for France and Belgium. 
During the last year and a half we had to prepare a carve-out for the acquisition of AMS by Boston Scientific. We had to split the Women's Health Business from Men's Health Business. The Women's health business remained with ENDO International when the Men's Health business was acquired by Boston Scientific (3rd of August 2015), ultimate owner of AMS France.

As of 29 April 2016, the French Statutory accounts have been filed, and provisional Accounts have been provided to the employee council in France at the end of March 2016 in order to comply with the French regulation and follow the merge calendar set by Boston Scientific. Meanwhile the Belgium Accounts have been also successfully audited and filed at the end of May 2016.
profile_positions.title: Senior Financial Accountant

profile_positions.description:
This role was close to the role of Assistant Controller position, except that I did manage directly the 5 Financial Accountants. 
- Set up of goals and follow up meetings
- Support the team with several adhoc meetings
- Review of Balance sheet, P&L analysis, OpEx reporting, journal entries processed,…
- Review of Payroll prior to payment process,
- Review of payments,
- Implementation of detailed month end checklist
- Review and implementation of new processes,
- Contact with the US and local stakeholder to ensure a good communication flow, OpEx control, forecast, and saving initiatives

Following the first restructuration of ENDO International, a reorganization of the Finance department occured and and I have been moved to a Senior Financial Accountant role for France and Benelux.
profile_positions.title: TEAM LEADER EMEA

profile_positions.description:
The fields where I was involved were: 
- Review of balance sheet and OpEx figures prepared by 5 Financial Accountants responsible for UK, Germany, Spain, Portugal, France, Italy, and Benelux.
- Preparation of SOX internal and external audit in relation with the US SOX team, 
- Planning of statutory audit and follow up audit issues, 
- Reporting of OpEx results to the US. 
- Training of Financial Accountant to Cognos tool, VAT, intrastate and EC sales listing
- Focus on communication with local teams and cross function teams by setting up weekly conference calls or meetings,
- Support provided to the team on several topics, like tax, statutory work, tax control, OpEx budgeting and planning…
profile_positions.title: ASSISTANT CONTROLLER

profile_positions.description:
As Financial Accountant, I have been responsible for AMS France and the Shared Service Center, AMS Europe. I did work on several fields as: Month end close, General Accounting, IC billing to the US and European distributors, VAT return, EC sales listing, Bank reconciliation, payroll, Audit work, Statutory Accounts for Dutch and French Gaap, budgeting and planning, work with budget owners on the achievement of their plan.
I also did merge the accounts from Laserscope France with the one of AMS France following the carve-out done by Laserscope for the Urology business and the Esthetical business. 
I have been also directly in contact with Tax Authorities during tax control and did follow up with the Financial Director and the US tax department the results of the tax control. During this tax control I did review the application of transfer pricing study and the main differences between US and French Gaap for the past accounting years. 
I did take part of the change of inventory owner and the consequence on the compliance side with double VAT registration in several European Countries.
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant

profile_positions.description: Temporary contract to support the new settled office in Breukelen particularly with Account Receivables, Statutory work and Audit with E/Y France, Month end close.
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant at AMS Europe BV

profile_positions.description: Supervision of Accounting, payroll with 2 collective agreements, social declaration, annual declaration of salary (DADS I & II), general accounting, review of billings, managing 1 employee responsible of Accounts Payable, Monthly declaration of VAT, and other tax declaration.
profile_positions.title: FINANCIAL ACCOUNTANT

company.name: CARTONNERIES NOUVELLES DE CHAMPAGNE/SMURFIT SOMICA (Filial of SMURFIT SOCAR)

profile_positions.company: CARTONNERIES NOUVELLES DE CHAMPAGNE/SMURFIT SOMICA (Filial of SMURFIT SOCAR)
profile_positions.description:
Following my graduation with the CNAM, I have been employed as flying Controller of cardboards factory by the Financial Director of Smurfit Socar. 

My first mission was at Cartonneries Nouvelles de Champagne in Reims, where I had to replace the Financial Controller on Maternity leave. I was responsible for all aspects of Accounting and administrative tasks included. I did manage 2 employees, was accountable for Month end close in SAP, reporting in SAP, Annual Accounts, VAT declaration, cash flow, finance analysis, payroll under AS400, all accounting and administrative tasks related to such position.

My Second mission did start in May 2002 at Smurfit Somica (Saint Amand Montrond), as well to replace the financial Controller who did get a promotion. I managed 1 employee, and was also responsible for month end close in SAP, reporting in Hyperion, Payroll in SAARI, Annual declaration of Salaries I & II, management of Cash flow, declaration of intrastate and VAT, valorisation and depreciation of Fixed Assets, follow up of Key Accounting Ratio related to cardboards production.
profile_positions.title: CONTROLLER

profile_positions.description: Worked in Shared Service Center as Account Payable Accountant: The role did consist in reconciling orders with invoices, record the invoice with related VAT applicable, control the different interfaces and follow the IT save.
profile_positions.title: Account Payable Accountant

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for evaluation of budget and costs of maintenance of regional electricity grid in SAP.
profile_positions.title: Accountant

profile_positions.description: Fargamel has manufactured and distributed lifting and handling accessories for the service, construction, marine, and offshore industries in France and Abroad. During these 6 months I did assist the Chief Accountant in several tasks, from AP, AR to general accounting. I also was in contact with the bank regularly due to the loan borrowed for the maintenance of manufacturing tools, as well as the follow up of letter of credit and other negotiable financial instruments.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Chief Accountant
